quoteText: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold us and our partners, agents, officers, directors, employees, subcontractors, successors, assigns, third-party suppliers of information and documents, attorneys, advertisers, product and service providers, and affiliates free from any liability, loss, claim, and expense, including reasonable attorneyâ€™s fees, related to your violation of this Agreement or use of our Platform.
title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
